Html: The code does not have a lot of things that make it .NET 2.0 only. If there any interest in a .NET 1.1 version?

Hi.

I wonder if you guy would be interested in having an auto-complete textbox?

Possibly,
I need to dig into MSBee and see how hard it is to support both 1.1 and 2.0 from the same code base. I have added a lot of attributes lately that are 2.0 only.

Hi Scorn,

Excellent work! I love these controls.

We have some applications which work on 1.1 I would love to use these in one of them.. I was wondering if anything has developed on this front.

Keep up the good work. I will definately use these in the future projects I do on 05..

Best regards,
Husain

I think we will be adding .Net 1.1 support after version 1.0 of the controls is released. We have added more .Net 2.0 specific code than I had originally thought. It makes more sense to finish the controls and then do a back port to 1.1. If we try to support both in the same code base Iâ€™m afraid it will bring development to a crawl. I do think at least for the moment we would have a larger user base if we supported 1.1.

Thanks,
scorn
